__TOC__

KPI aims to provide detailed insight on performance.
For this a lot of measurements need to be done.

Here we aim to provide a free framework for KPI measurements.

More details: <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Performance_indicator]]</nowiki>

Launchpad: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~key+performance+indicators]]</nowiki>
Source: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~key+performance+indicators/+archive/ppa]]</nowiki>
